alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 1:45PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Brookings and Moody Counties. In Minnesota, Lincoln, Lyon, Murray, Cottonwood, Nobles, Jackson, Pipestone and Rock Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing snow will be possible during the strongest wind gusts but is not expected to be widespread.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
